name: TheInternetofMysteriousThings
0:
”Alexa, ask the Internet of Mysterious Things to read the story”
”Alexa, ask the Internet of Mysterious Things to tell me a random fact about IoT”
”Alexa, ask the Internet of Mysterious Things how many backers have supported the Kickstarter campaign”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the internet of mysterious things
des:
Use The Internet of Mysterious Things Skill to explore a magical alternative universe of connected devices, unicorns, & zombies. This skill is a companion skill for the book titled "The Internet of Mysterious Things" written by Lisa Seacat DeLuca.

The Internet of Mysterious Things is the first ever book with embedded NFC tags. Each page of the story has an embedded NFC tag so you can tap your smart phone to each page to pull up more information about the story. It allows readers to learn about the underlying technologies for the Internet of Things (IoT) while using their imaginations about the mysterious creatures controlling our devices. 

You can use the skill without purchasing the book. Visit http://internetofmysteriousthings.com for more information.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
